alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 6:37PM MDT until June 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 637 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lone Star to 10 miles southwest of Yuma, or along a line extending from 26 miles southwest of Holyoke to 22 miles southeast of Akron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Washington County, including the following locations... Hyde. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
